title: Encoder

fields.name: Monitoring (Trigger 50%, Passive):
fields.value: This ability is active every time you score at least 50%. You will see everyone who visits a member of the Mafia.

fields.name: Corrupt Records (x1, Charge 80%):
fields.value: Target a player who placed below you last round. Their feedback tonight will be completely wiped.

fields.name: Encrypted Comms (Passive):
fields.value: While you have this ability, you may choose a disguise role for yourself, and the Mafia chat is secure, meaning no ability can gain access to the messages within. This ability is lost if you ever score below 35%.

desc:
Post 214
*Operational Security is important, you know.* (Role concept from Eklipse's Post-Apocalypse Mafia)
